        add player army by card
        参数:

      • findPath

        public boolean findPath​(Country sourceCountry,
                        Country targetCountry)
                 throws Models.CountryNotInRealms,
                        Models.SourceIsTargetException
        This function is used during the fortification phase to decide whether a player can move army from one country to another;
        参数:
        sourceCountry - The source country
        targetCountry - The target country
        返回:
        True if it is possible to transfer between given countries
        抛出:
        Models.CountryNotInRealms - country does not belong to the current player
        Models.SourceIsTargetException - source and target are the same

      • fortificate

        public void fortificate​(Country from,
                        Country to,
                        int num)
                 throws Models.CountryNotInRealms,
                        Models.OutOfArmyException,
                        Models.NoSuchPathException,
                        Models.SourceIsTargetException,
                        Models.MoveAtLeastOneArmyException
        Transfers army from one country to another during the fortification phase
        参数:
        from - - from which country army is being taken
        to - - to which country army is being send
        num - - number of the army to transfer
        抛出:
        Models.CountryNotInRealms - country not owned by the player
        Models.OutOfArmyException - not enough army to transfer
        Models.NoSuchPathException - no path from owned countries between country
        Models.SourceIsTargetException - source country and target country is the same
        Models.MoveAtLeastOneArmyException - 0 army chosen to move

      • getNumOfDice

        public int getNumOfDice()
        get number of dice
        返回:
        dice number

      • reinforcementPhase

        public void reinforcementPhase​(Country chosen)
        Sends 1 army from current player to chosen Country during reinforcement phase
        参数:
        chosen - Country where to send army to

      • attackPhase

        public boolean attackPhase​(Country from,
                           Country to)
                    throws Models.AttackingCountryOwner,
                           Models.AttackedCountryOwner,
                           Models.WrongDiceNumber,
                           Models.AttackCountryArmyMoreThanOne,
                           Models.TargetCountryNotAdjacent
        Attack phase
        参数:
        from - the source country
        to - the target country
        返回:
        true for attack success
        抛出:
        Models.AttackingCountryOwner - throw exception
        Models.AttackedCountryOwner - throw exception
        Models.WrongDiceNumber - throw exception
        Models.AttackCountryArmyMoreThanOne - throw exception
        Models.TargetCountryNotAdjacent - throw exception

      • attackPhase

        public boolean attackPhase​(Country from,
                           Country to,
                           int attackDice,
                           int defendDice)
                    throws Models.AttackingCountryOwner,
                           Models.AttackedCountryOwner,
                           Models.WrongDiceNumber,
                           Models.AttackCountryArmyMoreThanOne,
                           Models.TargetCountryNotAdjacent
        Attack phase
        参数:
        from - Country from where army will attacking
        to - Country from where army will be attacked
        attackDice - int number of dice to roll for attacker
        返回:
        true if country is conquered, false otherwise
        抛出:
        Models.AttackCountryArmyMoreThanOne - the number of army in attacking country must more than one
        Models.AttackingCountryOwner - the owner of attacking country must be current player
        Models.AttackedCountryOwner - the owner of attacked country must be the enemy
        Models.WrongDiceNumber
        Models.TargetCountryNotAdjacent

      • fortificationsPhase

        public void fortificationsPhase​(Country from,
                                Country to,
                                int num)
                         throws Models.SourceIsTargetException,
                                Models.MoveAtLeastOneArmyException,
                                Models.CountryNotInRealms,
                                Models.OutOfArmyException,
                                Models.NoSuchPathException
        Sends army from one country to another
        参数:
        from - Country from where army will be deducted
        to - Country from where army will be sent
        num - int number of armies to send
        抛出:
        Models.CountryNotInRealms - country not owned by the player
        Models.OutOfArmyException - not enough army to transfer
        Models.NoSuchPathException - no path from owned countries between country
        Models.SourceIsTargetException - source country and target country is the same
        Models.MoveAtLeastOneArmyException - 0 army chosen to move
